articles.title: Dustin Lance Black Cleared of Assaulting BBC Presenter in U.K. Court - Variety
articles.description: A U.K. magistrate has dismissed the case against Oscar winning screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, acquitting him of assault.
articles.content:
Oscar winning screenwriter Dustin Lance Black has been acquitted of assault in a London magistrates court after a district judge dismissed the case.
District Judge Louisa Cieciora, who was presiding… [+2488 chars]

articles.title: Dead by Daylight's Newest Killer Is Child's Play's Chucky - IGN
articles.description: Everyone's favorite serial-killing doll, Chucky from the Child's Play series, arrives as a new killer in Dead by Daylight on November 28. Enjoy this announcement trailer and first screenshots.

articles.content:
